00026 using namespace OpenRAVE;
00027 using namespace std;
00028 
00029 void SetViewer(EnvironmentBasePtr penv, const string& viewername)
00030 {
00031     ViewerBasePtr viewer = RaveCreateViewer(penv,viewername);
00032     BOOST_ASSERT(!!viewer);
00033 
00034     // attach it to the environment:
00035     penv->AddViewer(viewer);
00036 
00037     // finally you call the viewer's infinite loop (this is why you need a separate thread):
00038     bool showgui = true;
00039     viewer->main(showgui);
00040 }
00041 
00042 int main(int argc, char ** argv)
00043 {
00044     RaveInitialize(true); // start openrave core
00045     EnvironmentBasePtr penv = RaveCreateEnvironment(); // create the main environment
00046     boost::thread thviewer(boost::bind(SetViewer,penv,"qtcoin"));
00047     penv->Load("data/testwamcamera.env.xml");
00048     size_t ienablesensor = 0;
00049     // get all the sensors, this includes all attached robot sensors
00050     std::vector<SensorBasePtr> sensors;
00051     penv->GetSensors(sensors);
00052     while(1) {
00053         for(size_t isensor = 0; isensor < sensors.size(); ++isensor) {
00054             sensors[isensor]->Configure(isensor == ienablesensor ? SensorBase::CC_PowerOn : SensorBase::CC_PowerOff);
00055             sensors[isensor]->Configure(isensor == ienablesensor ? SensorBase::CC_RenderDataOn : SensorBase::CC_RenderDataOff);
00056         }
00057         ienablesensor = (ienablesensor+1)%sensors.size();
00058         usleep(5000000); // 5s
00059     }
00060     return 0;
00061 }
